fields.label: Full Name
fields.summary: Write LAST, FIRST, MIDDLE. Add name extension (Jr./Sr./III) if any. Check 'No Middle Name' only if applicable.

fields.label: Date of Birth
fields.summary: Enter in MM/DD/YYYY. Use digits in the boxes.

fields.label: Place of Birth
fields.summary: City/Municipality/Province/Country (indicate country if born abroad).

fields.label: Sex
fields.summary: Tick Male or Female.

fields.label: Citizenship
fields.summary: Select Filipino or Foreign National. If dual citizen, indicate basis (e.g., by birth, by law) and ID ref if any.

fields.label: Civil Status
fields.summary: Single, Married, Widowed/er, Annulled, or Legally Separated.

fields.label: PhilSys ID Number (Optional)
fields.summary: Enter your PhilSys ID (if available).

fields.label: TIN (Optional)
fields.summary: Enter your Taxpayer Identification Number if available.

fields.label: Mother’s Maiden Name
fields.summary: Write your mother’s full maiden name as on the birth certificate.

fields.label: Spouse (if Married)
fields.summary: Write spouse’s full name.

fields.label: Permanent Home Address
fields.summary: Complete: Unit/Room/Floor, Building, Lot/Block/Phase/House No., Street, Subdivision, Barangay, Municipality/City, Province/State/Country, ZIP.

fields.label: Mailing Address
fields.summary: Provide full mailing address. Tick 'Same as Above' if identical to permanent address.

fields.label: Contact Numbers
fields.summary: Home (with country/area code), Mobile (required), Business (direct/trunk + local).

fields.label: Email Address
fields.summary: Provide a valid email (required for OFW).

fields.label: Direct Contributor
fields.summary: Choose the specific sub-type (Employed Private/Government, Self-earning, Professional Practitioner, Kasambahay/Family Driver, Migrant Worker Land/Sea, Dual Citizen/Living Abroad, Foreign National, etc.).

fields.label: Indirect Contributor
fields.summary: Select applicable (Listahanan, 4Ps/MCCT, LGU/NGA-sponsored, Senior Citizen, Lifetime Member, POS Financially Incapable, etc.).

fields.label: Profession / Monthly Income / Proof
fields.summary: For Direct Contributors (except Employed, Sea-based, Lifetime): indicate profession, monthly income, and attach proof.

fields.label: Dependents List
fields.summary: List living spouse, children <21, and parents (≥60) totally dependent. Provide full names, dates of birth, relationship, and citizenship. Mark permanent disability if applicable.

fields.label: PWD Coverage Note
fields.summary: Persons with disability (PWD) are registered as principal members under RA 11228.

fields.label: Update Type
fields.summary: Tick what to update: Name (any part), Date of Birth, Sex, Civil Status, Personal Information, Address, Phone/Mobile, Email.

fields.label: Correct Data
fields.summary: Provide the correct entries in the appropriate fields and attach supporting documents.

fields.label: Preferred KonSulTa Provider
fields.summary: Indicate preferred KonSulTa provider near home or work (not for Employed, Lifetime, Sea-based MW).

fields.label: Member’s Declaration
fields.summary: Sign over printed name and date. Certify truthfulness and authorize validation/data sharing per law with adequate security.

fields.label: Right Thumbmark
fields.summary: Affix if unable to write.

fields.label: Receiving Details
fields.summary: To be filled by PRO/LHIO/Branch: receiver’s name, date/time, and office codes.

fields.label: PIN Reminder
fields.summary: Your PhilHealth Identification Number (PIN) is unique and permanent; always use it for transactions.
